points: Designed and productionized end-to-end educational AI pipelines, serving models at scale.
Built marking-scheme–aware evaluation workflows to automate grading accuracy assessment.
Developed QC frameworks for hallucination control, reducing manual review effort by 40%.
Drove metrics-based model iteration, significantly improving content generation quality.
Led a small ML engineering team delivering freelance AI and data solutions for external clients.
Built and deployed ML pipelines for NLP, forecasting, and analytics using Python and FastAPI.
Designed REST APIs and client-facing dashboards for production model consumption.
Managed client requirements and delivered robust, scalable solutions for real-world use cases.
Optimized data processing scripts, improving execution time by 20%.
Developed Django-based applications for internal business logic management.
Conducted applied research in computer vision and pattern recognition.
Implemented state-of-the-art models for comparative analysis on benchmark datasets.
